languages.text: Корабль "Неотвратимость торжества" пропал на пути к Футфолу десятилетия назад. Недалеко от системы Авиорус был найден шаттл с корабля.

traits.locale_text: Корабль "Неотвратимость торжества" пропал на пути к Футфолу десятилетия назад. Недалеко от системы Авиорус был найден шаттл с корабля.

languages.text: Decades ago, a ship called the Inevitable Triumph went missing on course for Footfall. A shuttle from that ship has been discovered not far from the Aviorus System.
languages.original_text: Корабль "Неотвратимость торжества" пропал на пути к Футфолу десятилетия назад. Недалеко от системы Авиорус был найден шаттл с корабля.

traits.locale_text: Decades ago, a ship called the Inevitable Triumph went missing on course for Footfall. A shuttle from that ship has been discovered not far from the Aviorus System.
Decades ago, a ship called the Inevitable Triumph went missing on course for Footfall. A shuttle from that ship has been discovered not far from the Aviorus System.
Decades ago, a ship called the Inevitable Triumph went missing on course for Footfall. A shuttle from that ship has been discovered not far from the Aviorus System.
Decades ago, a ship called the Inevitable Triumph went missing on course for Footfall. A shuttle from that ship has been discovered not far from the Aviorus System.

languages.text: 几十年前，一艘名为“命定凯旋号”的飞船在前往落脚港的旅途中失踪了。如今，在离艾维罗斯星系不远的地方，有人发现了来自那艘飞船的穿梭机。
languages.original_text: Decades ago, a ship called the Inevitable Triumph went missing on course for Footfall. A shuttle from that ship has been discovered not far from the Aviorus System.

traits.locale_text: 几十年前，一艘名为“命定凯旋号”的飞船在前往落脚港的旅途中失踪了。如今，在离艾维罗斯星系不远的地方，有人发现了来自那艘飞船的穿梭机。

languages.text: 数十年前、不当な勝利という名の船がフットフォールの航路上で行方不明になった。その船からのシャトルがアビオルス星系の近くで発見されたのだ。
languages.original_text: Decades ago, a ship called the Inevitable Triumph went missing on course for Footfall. A shuttle from that ship has been discovered not far from the Aviorus System.

traits.locale_text: 数十年前、不当な勝利という名の船がフットフォールの航路上で行方不明になった。その船からのシャトルがアビオルス星系の近くで発見されたのだ。

languages.text: Hace décadas, la nave Triunfo Inevitable desapareció camino de Paso. Se ha encontrado una lanzadera de dicha nave cerca del sistema Aviorus.
languages.original_text: Decades ago, a ship called the Inevitable Triumph went missing on course for Footfall. A shuttle from that ship has been discovered not far from the Aviorus System.

traits.locale_text: Hace décadas, la nave Triunfo Inevitable desapareció camino de Paso. Se ha encontrado una lanzadera de dicha nave cerca del sistema Aviorus.

languages.text: Vor mehreren Jahrzehnten ist ein Schiff namens "Unausweichlicher Triumph" auf dem Weg nach Footfall verschwunden. Ein Shuttle des Schiffs wurde unweit des Aviorus-Systems entdeckt.
languages.original_text: Decades ago, a ship called the Inevitable Triumph went missing on course for Footfall. A shuttle from that ship has been discovered not far from the Aviorus System.

traits.locale_text: Vor mehreren Jahrzehnten ist ein Schiff namens "Unausweichlicher Triumph" auf dem Weg nach Footfall verschwunden. Ein Shuttle des Schiffs wurde unweit des Aviorus-Systems entdeckt.

languages.text: Il y a plusieurs décennies, un vaisseau baptisé le Triomphe inexorable a disparu alors qu'il faisait route vers Castel. Une navette de ce vaisseau a été retrouvée non loin du système d'Aviorus.
languages.original_text: Decades ago, a ship called the Inevitable Triumph went missing on course for Footfall. A shuttle from that ship has been discovered not far from the Aviorus System.

traits.locale_text: Il y a plusieurs décennies, un vaisseau baptisé le Triomphe inexorable a disparu alors qu'il faisait route vers Castel. Une navette de ce vaisseau a été retrouvée non loin du système d'Aviorus.

languages.text: On yıllar önce Kaçınılmaz Zafer isminde bir gemi, Binliman'a giderken kaybolmuş. Avirous Sistemi'nin yakınlarında bu gemiye ait bir mekik keşfedildi.
languages.original_text: Decades ago, a ship called the Inevitable Triumph went missing on course for Footfall. A shuttle from that ship has been discovered not far from the Aviorus System.

traits.locale_text: On yıllar önce Kaçınılmaz Zafer isminde bir gemi Binliman yolunda kaybolmuş. Avirous Sistemi'nin yakınlarında o gemiye ait bir mekik keşfedildi.
